title: Senna Being the Next Champ is the Perfect 10th Anniversery Champion
body:
With the 10th anniversary, you generally want to do something big for the game and Senna being the next champ is perfect for that. With Senna being next...

* You conclude/progress one of the longest running rivalries in League's history (Lucian vs. Thresh)
* You pull one of the great lore figures who still isn't a champion.
* You silence people who think lore is still JUST retcons and rewrites.
* You add a major champion who will change the story of the world (or at least the shadow isles) in a major way.
* You might even _kill_ a god damn champion. (I don't think Lucian or Thresh are walking out of this one without at least one scar).

Not sure if this was timed on purpose or just a happy accident but it all lines up in an immensely satisfying way.

I just hope Senna doesn't come out of this without scars either. You don't exactly get tortured for years and brought back to life via unholy magic and be the same person. Mental scars, definitely. Physical scars, maybe not, since the body likely isn't her's(she likely possessed someone since she's just a soul).

I mean, she had to watch Lucian fail over and over again for years, watch him get hurt, probably watch Thresh kill/torture countless other people, as well as getting tortured by Thresh herself. She's probably gonna be a bit fucked in the head from all that.

Considering that she will likely become free on the shadow isles, a place filled with the black mist, I'd say it is likely that she won't get a body at all, but simply be a ghost, just like the other shadow isles champs.

Looking at {{champion:30}}, who seems to be the most corporeal shadow isles champ, I'd say it is even possible that the ghost body of someone starts out looking quite like their physical body, with it degenerating over time.
Because of this Thresh and Hecarim are pretty much just ghostly flames that fill a shape that vaguely resembles them in life, while Karthus looks like a decaying corpse.

Kalista might be a special case since she frequently absorbs new souls into her body.
